attributes.action: To ensure the democratic decision to leave the EU is carried out.
attributes.additional_details:
This country is a democracy and the people have spoken, we as the people of Great Britain expect nothing less than our elected officials to support the clear decision made on the 23rd June 2016.
It is not the role of MP's to dictate our direction it is the people's decision and the decision is leave the EU.
attributes.background: Following the petitions to carry out a further EU referendum and British media peddling fear. The leadership of this country should be standing up for result that we the people voted for.
